meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Grant Hutchinson Keith Williams Josh Perkins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4419.

div.div:
2003 College Championship final game 1.
From Yale University.

td.p: Grant Hutchinson, a freshman at the University of West Florida from Pensacola, Florida
Keith Williams, a freshman at Middlebury College from Manchester, Vermont
Josh Perkins, a sophomore at Rice University from Houston, Texas

tr.td: THE CIVIL WAR
LATE NIGHT TV
WILDLIFE
CAN YOU PICTURE THIS?
ROTC
3-LETTER WORDS IN YALE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'This Union General\'s troops averaged 12-15 miles a day on their 1864 march to Savannah')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: This Union General's troops averaged 12-15 miles a day on their 1864 march to Savannah
